body_html:
hmm, could you give more specs about your machine. Specifically, what

python -c "import platform; print platform.machine()"

outputs. If the above outputs 'ppc64le', then --config=opt won't add -march=native flag and will instead add -mcpu=native.
body_text:
hmm, could you give more specs about your machine. Specifically, what
python -c "import platform; print platform.machine()"
outputs. If the above outputs 'ppc64le', then --config=opt won't add -march=native flag and will instead add -mcpu=native.
body:
hmm, could you give more specs about your machine. Specifically, what

python -c "import platform; print platform.machine()"

outputs. If the above outputs 'ppc64le', then --config=opt won't add -march=native flag and will instead add -mcpu=native.
